analysis_steps.description: Starting file structure and organization analysis

consistency_issues: Inconsistent file extension usage for similar content types
Split files with inconsistent naming patterns (4thQuery_part1.txt, 4thQuery_part2.txt, etc.)
positive_patterns: Some related files share common prefixes (4thQuery and parts)

recommended_conventions.files: snake_case with descriptive names indicating purpose

modularity_assessment.coupling_analysis: High - files appear to be fragmented parts of larger processes
modularity_assessment.cohesion_analysis: Poor - related functionality split across multiple files without clear organization

configuration_management.security_assessment: Risk - potential hardcoded credentials in SQL/SAS files
recommendations: Separate data processing logic from configuration
Extract credentials to secure configuration management

build_and_deployment.deployment_readiness: Poor - no build or deployment automation evident
build_and_deployment.documentation_structure: Minimal - README.md exists but contains minimal content
build_and_deployment.testing_structure: Missing - no test files or test structure identified

improvement_opportunities.action: Reorganize into functional directories (sql/, sas/, documentation/, config/)
Implement consistent naming convention across all files
improvement_opportunities.impact: Improves understanding of file purposes and relationships

improvement_opportunities.action: Consolidate fragmented query files and separate by functional purpose
Create comprehensive README with project purpose, file descriptions, and execution order
improvement_opportunities.impact: Enables faster onboarding and knowledge transfer

improvement_opportunities.action: Implement orchestration scripts for job sequence execution
improvement_opportunities.impact: Reduces manual execution errors and improves reliability

ideal_structure_suggestion.README.md: Comprehensive project overview, purpose and usage instructions
ideal_structure_suggestion.sql/: Organized SQL files with consistent naming
ideal_structure_suggestion.sas/: SAS code files organized by processing stage
